name: Nukalypse Zombie Survival
description: "Nukalypse Zombie Survival" is a parody of the "Call Of Duty : Zombies" franchise,requiring less power out of a PC. Endless rounds of zombies are coming at you,getting stronger withh each round and in increasing numbers. Choose your favorite weapon,weather it be a pistol,shotgun,sniper rifle,or just a plain old machine gun. Discover the ruins of the now infected mental hospital where it all began as you and your team of allies must find a way out and try to find a cure and kill the man who started it all...
